Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (rSOCs) offer the prospect of long term bulk energy storage using hydrogen or methane fuel.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: Whilst less mature than alkaline and PEM fuel cell/electrolysis technology, solid oxide cells offer superior efficiency: as high as 80-90%(LHV) at system level.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: Furthermore, the possibility of using the cells reversibly means that separate 'power-to-gas' and 'gas-to-power' components are not needed.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: Here, we consider the suitability of a hydrogen energy storage system (HESS) using rSOCs for a solar-powered residential microgrid.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: Battery energy storage (BESS) is considered as a competing (or complementary) energy storage technology.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: Since the electrification of transport is likely to be a major aspect of the transformation of domestic energy consumption, electric cars are also included in the microgrid model.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: The performance of the microgrid is evaluated in terms of its grid independence (self-sufficiency ratio, SSR) and economics (simple payback time and net present value).
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: Optimisation is used to select and size the microgrid's components under different scenarios.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: Optimisation results suggest that battery storage is often preferred to HESS.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: However, two factors in particular can cause the selection of HESS to be favoured: (i) a requirement for high SSR and (ii) a lower constraint (6 kW) on the PV capacity per household.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications

Sentencas: The economics for such systems remain very challenging.
Titulo: Long term energy storage with reversible solid oxide cells for microgrid applications
